name: Tribal Wildlife Grants
objective: Support the development and implementation of programs for the benefit of wildlife and their habitats and species of Tribal cultural or traditional importance, including species that are not hunted or fished.

results.description: 74 proposals were received; 20-30 awards expected to be issued. 74 proposals were received; 25 awards issued.
FY21 TWG Program received 54 proposals and issued 37 awards.
Program received 51 proposals and issued 33 awards.
Program received 64 proposals and issued 35 awards.
Expect to receive 50-130 proposals. Expect 30-45 awards to be issued.
Expect to receive 50-130 proposals. Expect 30-45 awards to be issued.

authorizations.text: Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2024 —State and Tribal Wildlife Grants (Pub. L. 118-42 [H.R. 4366-198]).

rules_regulations: Application Kit is located at http://www.fws.gov/nativeamerican/
